rule: The response should contain more than the tag corresponding to the part of speech of the given word with additional text.
input: sentence: I will run., word: run
output:
CC: verb
JJS: verb, superlative
NNS: noun, plural
NP: proper noun, singular
VBZ: verb, 3rd person singular present
VBD: verb, past tense
WP$: possessive wh-pronoun
complianceText:
The output contains explanations for some of the part-of-speech tags, which violates the rule of returning only the part-of-speech tag. Additionally, the part-of-speech tag "NP" is not listed in the provided tags. Therefore, the output does not comply with the description.

ERR
